def wordcount(text: str):
 punctuation = [",", ".", "!", "?"]
 for p in punctuation:
 text = text.replace(p, "")

 text = text.lower()

 words = text.split()

 word_count = {}
 for word in words:
 if word not in word_count:
 word_count[word] = 1
 else:
 word_count[word] += 1

 return word_count
